name: Metapod

evolution.description: Metapod can evolve into Butterfree at level 6 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 8 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Cocoon Pokémon. Hardens its shell to protect itself. However, a large impact may cause it to pop out of its shell.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: If this Pokémon is affected by a negative status ailment, they can roll a d4 at the end of each of their turns. On a result of 4, they are cured.
